Guard Johnstone:
Since I was young, I have idolized Mystics and wanted to study at Einhovant's School of, Wizardry, but unfortunately the teachers there told me I had no magical talent.
Now i realize that my physical strength is where my true gifts lie. In the end, Ive become a guard, and i dont regret it.
Ask about Einhovant's School of Wizardry.
